2052730.name: I'm Prop: Hide and Seek Game
2052730.description:
I'm Prop is an online hide-and-seek game in everyone's favorite prophunt genre. Here Hunters try to find magical dwarfes that live off of energy of their surroundings.

Dwarfes turn themselves into props on the map and blend in with the enviroment. They need to hide from Hunters and survive. The Hunters win if all the props are killed, and the Props win if the time runs out or all the hunters are dead.

As a dwarf (Prop) you need to hide from the Hunters disguising as any prop available on the map.

As a Hunter you must find and kill Props. To do that you have a specialized weapon. But you have to be careful-every shot counts!
2052730.supported_languages: 英语, 意大利语, 德语, 简体中文, 韩语, 波兰语, 俄语, 乌克兰语, 日语, 白俄罗斯语
